title: Week 1 Preview & Pats/Chiefs Recap
itunes:title: Week 1 Preview & Pats/Chiefs Recap
description:
A room filled with heroes Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler & Gregg Rosenthal,– recap all the latest news from around the NFL including the much anticipated season opener game between the Kansas City Chiefs and the New England Patriots. The heroes also give a detailed breakdown of what the forecast looks like for weekend one of the 2017 season.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
